mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Mythoria, we believe every person has a unique story worth telling. Our mission is to democratize storytelling by using AI to help anyone create beautiful, personalized narratives that capture their memories, dreams, and imagination.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Mythoria was born from a simple idea: what if we could use technology to help people become the authors of their own adventures? Founded by storytelling enthusiasts and AI experts, we're passionate about bridging the gap between imagination and reality.

creativity.title: Creativity First
creativity.description: We believe in the power of imagination and strive to amplify human creativity through technology.

personalization.title: Personal Touch
personalization.description: Every story should be as unique as the person living it. We ensure each narrative is deeply personal and meaningful.

quality.title: Quality Craftsmanship
quality.description: From writing to illustrations to printing, we maintain the highest standards in everything we create.

accessibility.title: Stories for Everyone
accessibility.description: Great storytelling shouldn't be limited by technical skills or resources. We make it accessible to all.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: Our diverse team of writers, AI specialists, designers, and dreamers is united by a shared passion for storytelling and innovation.
